author: EternalllZM
name: ComponentsV2Utils
short: Send rich Discord Components V2 messages from YAML or JSON.
description: A Red-DiscordBot cog to send, store, and post Discord Components V2 layout messages. Supports TextDisplay (markdown), Separators, Sections (with thumbnail/button accessories), MediaGalleries, and Containers â€” defined in clean YAML or JSON. No classic embeds required.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
